source_sentence: 佛說海意菩薩所問淨印法門經
translation: Foshuo haiyi pusa suowen jingshien famen jing

source_sentence: 卷第十八
translation: Vol. 18

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試鴻臚卿傳梵大師賜紫沙門臣法護等奉　詔譯「◎復次，海意！
translation: The Tripiṭaka of the Western Translation of the Sutra, the Minister of the Imperial Court of the Imperial Court for the Transmission of the Sutra of Brahmā to the Purple Monk, Hōshō, and others, were instructed to translate the sutra, "Furthermore, Haiyi!

source_sentence: 我今為汝宣說呼召帝釋天主祕密章句。
translation: Now, I'll explain for you the secret phrase for summoning Indra the God of Heaven.

source_sentence: 而此章句，速能呼召帝釋天主，來護正法。」
translation: These words and phrases will quickly summon Indra the god Śākyamuni to protect the true teaching."

source_sentence: 如是祕密章句，而能呼召帝釋天主，有此正法之處，來為作護，及能攝護其說法師。
translation: This is the secret statement that calls Indra the god to guard the place where the right teaching exists and to guard the Dharma preacher.

source_sentence: 而彼法師，應當以此祕密章句，作持誦已，潔淨身心，依法沐浴，著新淨衣，處師子座；向於東方散擲妙花，祈求諸佛，願賜攝受；於諸眾生起大悲念，虔想帝釋天主哀愍，故來為我安布聽法之眾，令其嚴肅；復令此陀羅尼文句和合。
translation: That Dharma teacher should recite this esoteric statement, cleanse his body and mind, bathe according to the rules, put on fresh, pure clothing, sit on a lion's seat, scatter marvelous flowers in the east, pray to the buddhas to grant their acceptance, arouse great compassion for sentient beings, and reverently contemplate that Lord Tishra's kindness is such that he'll arrange the audience for me and make them respectful, and cause the words of this dhāraṇī to blend with each other.

source_sentence: 如是等事現前所作，若彼法師，內心清淨戒行潔白，即能令其帝釋天主來為攝受，安布眾會，和合文句，善作加護。」
translation: Such things are done now, and if that teacher of the Dharma has a pure heart and a clean moral practice, it will cause that Indra-deva to come and take them in, arrange the congregation, harmonize the words, and skillfully defend them."

source_sentence: 爾時，帝釋天主現在此會，即從座起前白佛言：「如世尊勅，於後末世，若有法師而能受持此正法者，我當往彼，為其安布眾會，和合文句，而作加護；又此正法所在之處，為其攝受，令法久住。
translation: At that point, the Śakra Devānām-Indra was present at this meeting and rose from his seat to go before the Buddha and say, "According to the Bhagavān's command, if there's a Dharma teacher in the latter part of time who can uphold this right teaching, I will go there, arrange a congregation for him, combine the words and phrases, and defend him; and wherever this right teaching is, I will collect it for him so that it will last a long time.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 又此正法於後末世，我當為彼三十三天諸天子眾，常廣宣說。
translation: "In the latter part of time, I will always explain this right teaching in detail for the Trāyastriṃśa gods and their descendants.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 今此正法，即是過去、未來、現在諸佛世尊菩提之法，佛所讚故。
translation: 'Now, this right teaching is the enlightening Dharma of the world-honored buddhas of the past, future, and present, and it's praised by the Buddha.

source_sentence: 又復我於過去、未來、現在諸佛世尊菩提之法，起尊重已，是故我當說此正法。」
translation: Furthermore, after I have arisen from respect for the enlightening Dharma of the world-honored buddhas of the past, future, and present, I will therefore explain this right teaching."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊讚帝釋天主言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān praised Śakra Devānām-Indra, saying, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 憍尸迦！
translation: Kauśika!

source_sentence: 汝能作師子吼，發如是言，於後末世護持正法，如汝所言應如是行。
translation: If you can make a lion's roar and say this, then in the latter part of time you'll safeguard the right teaching, just as you said you would do.

source_sentence: 又憍尸迦！
translation: Kauśika!

source_sentence: 以此正法攝受力故，能令諸天隨所願求常得最勝，阿修羅眾威光退失。
translation: Because of the power of this right Dharma's gathering in, the gods will always attain the greatest excellence according to their desires, and the dignified radiance of the asuras will fade.

source_sentence: 「復次，海意！
translation: "Furthermore, Haiyi!

source_sentence: 我今為汝宣說攝伏諸魔天眾祕密章句，而此章句，速能攝伏諸魔天眾，來護正法。」
translation: Now, I will explain for you the secret rules for subduing the host of Māra gods, and these rules will quickly subdue the host of Māra gods and protect the true teaching."

source_sentence: 如是祕密章句，而能攝伏諸魔天眾，復能消除一切煩惱。
translation: Such a secret statement can subdue a multitude of demons and gods and also remove all afflictions.

source_sentence: 彼說法師，以此祕密章句作持誦已，處于法座，普觀眾會悉住道場，廣運無量大慈之心，當於己身起醫王想，法如藥想，於聽法眾起病人想，於佛如來起正士想，法眼不失起久住想。
translation: After reciting this esoteric statement, the Dharma preacher then places himself in the Dharma seat, universally observes the congregation all abiding in the site of enlightenment, and widely exercises measureless great compassion, which should give rise to the notion of the king of doctors and the teaching as medicine, the notion of the sick among those who hear the teaching, the notion of the Buddha as tathāgata as a righteous man, and the notion of the long abiding of the Dharma eye that isn't lost.

source_sentence: 如是等事，以此祕密章句加持力故，現前施作，廣為一切如應說法。
translation: Such things, based on the empowering power of these esoteric phrases and sentences, are performed beforehand, and they are taught in detail for all those who should receive them.

source_sentence: 是時周匝百由旬內諸魔天眾，悉不能來作破壞事。
translation: The demons and gods within a hundred leagues of circumference then can't come and cause harm.

source_sentence: 設復諸魔至法會者，亦復不能作諸障難。」
translation: Even if Māra were to come to the Dharma assembly, they wouldn't be able to do anything to hinder it."

source_sentence: 爾時，諸魔天眾現在此會，即從座起前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, the Māra celestials present at the assembly rose from their seats and said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今見此海意菩薩大士，以威神力加持我故，置我於彼諸樂莊嚴世界之中。
translation: Now, I've seen this Bodhisattva-mahāsattva of the Sea of Wishes place me in one of those worlds of bliss and adornment because he has empowered me with his authority.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我今最初已悉棄捨諸魔事業，是故我等於此正法常當護持。
translation: Now, I've originally renounced all the works of Māra, so we will always safeguard this right teaching.

source_sentence: 後末世中，若城邑聚落若僧坊中，有人宣說此正法者，我當往彼，離諸慢心，恭敬、尊重、專注聽受。」
translation: In a later age, if there's someone in a town or village or in a monastery who teaches this right teaching, I will go there, free myself from conceit, and listen with respect, honor, and attention."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊讚諸魔言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: The Bhagavān then praised the Māras, saying, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝等諸魔而能尊重如是正法，最先已捨諸魔事業。
translation: You Māras who respect the right teaching like this are the first to abandon the works of Māra.

source_sentence: 汝等今於如是法中有所獲得，此由海意菩薩大士神力所致。
translation: Now, you've attained something in this way because of the spiritual power of the Bodhisattva Hayagrīva.

source_sentence: 「復次，海意！
translation: "Furthermore, Hayagrīva!

source_sentence: 我今為汝宣說呼召娑婆界主大梵天王祕密章句。
translation: Now, I'll explain for you the esoteric phrase for summoning the king of Brahmā, the lord of the sahā realm.

source_sentence: 而此章句，速能呼召大梵天王，來法師所當為作護。」
translation: These words and phrases will quickly summon the king of Brahmā, who will come to the Dharma teacher's office to guard him."

source_sentence: 如是祕密章句，而能呼召大梵天王。
translation: This is the kind of esoteric phrase that summons the king of the Brahman gods.

source_sentence: 其說法師以此祕密章句作持誦已，應當依止梵行，住無礙心，隱密諸根，善護諸念，所言決定。
translation: After reciting this esoteric statement, the Dharma preacher should rely on the religious practice, abide in an unobstructed mind, keep his faculties hidden, guard his mindfulness well, and make certain of what he says.

source_sentence: 於其身業善令清淨，於其語業真實攝護，善固心慧，善修忍行，善淨戒蘊，善發精進之力，善持多聞諦，善觀想令心調暢，極利慧根，善修正行，善護菩提心，善修慈觀，安立大悲，普令眾生畢竟解脫一切苦惱，普令眾生獲得妙樂。
translation: He should skillfully purify his physical actions, truly guard his verbal actions, skillfully consolidate his mind's wisdom, skillfully cultivate the practice of forbearance, skillfully purify the aggregate of precepts, skillfully generate the power of effort, skillfully maintain the truth of being well-versed, skillfully contemplate to bring his mind into harmony, skillfully cultivate the faculty of wisdom, skillfully guard the mind of enlightenment, skillfully cultivate the contemplation of kindness, and establish great compassion, which will ultimately liberate sentient beings from all suffering and affliction and cause them to attain marvelous happiness.

source_sentence: 其說法師起是心已，當處師子之座，祈求大梵天王，願垂攝受，然後如應為佗說法。
translation: After he aroused this intention, the Dharma preacher sat down at the lion's seat, prayed to King Brahmā to grant him acceptance, and then preached the Dharma for Tuo as he should.

source_sentence: 即時大梵天王與諸梵眾，來法師所而為護持。
translation: Immediately, the king of Brahmā and the Brahmakāyika community came to the Dharma preacher's place to defend him.

source_sentence: 又復，海意！
translation: Again, Sāgarī!

source_sentence: 其說法師應當覺知。
translation: That preacher of the Dharma should know.

source_sentence: 大梵天王至法會時，有諸善相，所謂一切眾會咸起慈心，或復眾會諸根無缺；或復互相安住菩提法中；或復愛樂法及法師，起尊重想；或離諸染污；或專注一心離散亂意；或復繫念於諸善法；或攝斂諸念止絕外聞，諦意聽法；或於法師所，昔未曾說，昔未曾聞諸妙法門，聞已能說。
translation: When the king of Brahmā comes to the Dharma assembly, there are various good appearances, such as when all the assembled people become compassionate, or when the assembled people's faculties are unimpaired, or when they abide in the bodhisattva dharma with each other, or when they love the dharma and the Dharma teacher and give rise to thoughts of respect, or when they are free of defilements, or when they concentrate their minds single-mindedly and free of distracting thoughts, or when they are fixated on mindfulness of the good dharmas, or when they control their thoughts and stop hearing from outsiders and listen to the dharma with true intent, or when they are able to explain subtle aspects of the dharma to a Dharma teacher that haven't been explained in the past and haven't been heard in the past after hearing them.

source_sentence: 若有如是等諸相現時，當知即是大梵天王來至法會。」
translation: When these kinds of things appear, you should know that it's the arrival of King Brahmā at the Dharma assembly."

source_sentence: 爾時，大梵天王現在此會，即從座起前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At the time, the king of Brahmā gods, who was present at the assembly, rose from his seat and went forward to say to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 在在處處若復有人宣說如是甚深正法者，我居梵界雖有無量禪定之樂，悉能棄置，即當往彼說法師所為作加護。
translation: "If someone were to preach such a profound teaching everywhere, even though I live in the Brahma realm and have measureless pleasures of meditation, I'd be able to abandon them all and go to their Dharma preacher's office to defend them.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 加護之法，有其八種。
translation: There are eight kinds of protective measures.

source_sentence: 何等為八？
translation: What are the eight?

source_sentence: 一者、加護其念，令彼如所聞法而不忘失；二者、加護其慧，令彼於甚深法不相違背；三者、加護其行，令彼於義皆悉解了；四者、加護辯才，令彼斷諸疑惑；五者、加護記說，令彼一切語言音聲聞者皆喜；六者、加護化度之法，令彼超勝一切眾會；七者、加護現法光明令無暗鈍；八者、加護得出離門，令其依法修證。
translation: 1. to guard their mindfulness so that they don't forget the teaching as they've heard it; 2. to guard their wisdom so that they don't contradict the profound teaching; 3. to guard their practice so that they fully understand its meaning; 4. to guard their eloquence so that they end their doubts; 5. to guard their explanation so that the sounds of all languages and sounds heard by them are pleasing; 6. to guard the teaching that liberates so that it surpasses all assemblies; 7. to guard the light of the present teaching so that it isn't dull; and 8. to guard the gate of emancipation so that they cultivate its realization according to the Dharma.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我以如是八法，善作加護其說法師，而復我等於法師所，密常營衛令法久住，諸魔怨諍咸悉除滅；此等皆是如來威神之所建立，令其正法廣大流布。」
translation: With these eight things, I've skillfully defended my Dharma preacher, and we've maintained our Dharma preceptor in a guarded manner so that the Dharma will last, and all the enemies of Māra will be removed; these are all established by the Tathāgata's authoritative power, which causes the true Dharma to spread far and wide."

source_sentence: 爾時，海意菩薩復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, Sāgaramati Bodhisattva again said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 今此正法，惟願世尊威神建立，使令久住。
translation: Now, let's hope that the Bhagavān's authority and spirit will establish this right teaching so that it will last for a long time.

source_sentence: 於佛如來入涅槃後末世之中，若有深種善根諸眾生等，令得如是甚深經典，受於手中，或安篋笥展轉流布令不隱沒。」
translation: In the final age after the Tathāgata's entry into nirvāṇa, if there are sentient beings with deeply cultivated good roots, let them receive such a profound scripture in their hands or place it in a case, spread it around, and make sure it isn't hidden."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊受海意菩薩伸勸請已，即於眉間放眾色光，其光遍照此三千大千世界廣大明耀。
translation: After the Bhagavān accepted the Haiyi Bodhisattva's outstretched invitation, he then radiated a multicolored light between his eyebrows, which shone brightly and broadly throughout this 3,000 great one-thousand worlds.

source_sentence: 而此三千大千世界之中，一切藥草、樹林、砂石如是種類，蒙光照觸，皆悉變成如來形像。
translation: In this 3,000 great one-thousand worlds, all the medicinal plants, trees, sand, and rocks of that sort are transformed into the Tathāgata's image when the light shines on them.

source_sentence: 所變之像，皆於大寶莊嚴道場之中而為供養。
translation: The images that are transformed are all offered up in the great jeweled site of the Way.

source_sentence: 以佛威神所建立故，其所變化如來之像，即時各各異口同音作如是言：「世尊釋迦牟尼如來！
translation: Because of the Buddha's authoritative power, the images of the Tathāgata that they transform immediately each speak with one voice, saying, "Bhagavān Śākyamuni, the Tathāgata!

source_sentence: 威神建立此正法故，即彼十方一切如來，亦以威神共所建立。
translation: Because their authority and spirit establish this right teaching, all the tathāgatas in the ten directions also establish it together with their authority and spirit.

source_sentence: 若彼諸佛威神建立故，即彼諸魔不能作其障難。
translation: If those buddhas' authoritative power establishes it, then Māra won't be able to cause any obstruction.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 正使魔眾其數猶如殑伽沙等，威勢增強盡其勇力，畢竟不能於此正法而興難事。
translation: "Even though the number of Māras is like that of sands, their might and power are so great that they're unable to cause any trouble with the right teaching after all.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 假使大地分裂破壞，一切大海而悉枯涸，諸須彌山碎若微塵，風可繫縛，日月墜地，空現色像，火中得水，水中得火，四大種中各有異性，一切眾生而同一心，虛空與地二事相合；假使若有如是等事，而亦不能於佛如來加持力中，而有少法可動可轉。」
translation: Suppose the earth were to be split up and destroyed, all the seas were to dry up, the Sumeru mountains were to crumble like dust, the wind could bind them, the sun and moon were to fall to the ground, emptiness were to appear as form, water in fire and fire in water, each of the four elements were to have a different nature, all sentient beings were to be of the same mind, and the two things of space and earth were to merge; even if such things were to occur, there wouldn't be a few things that could be moved and turned by the Buddha's Tathāgata's empowering power."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即舉右手，置於尊者阿難頂上，而告之言：「阿難！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān raised his right hand and placed it on Venerable Ānanda's head, telling him, "Ānanda!

source_sentence: 汝當受持此之正法，於後末世廣宣流布，令得受持讀誦演說，使佛正法久住世間。」
translation: You must accept this right teaching and spread it far and wide in the latter part of time so that it can be memorized, recited, and taught, and so that the Buddha's right teaching will long endure in the world."

source_sentence: 爾時，海意菩薩白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, Sāgaradhvaja said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 見何義故，乃以如是甚深正法，付囑阿難苾芻？
translation: What do you see as the reason you entrusted this profound teaching to Ānanda's monks?

source_sentence: 而阿難者具分限智；此會中有諸大菩薩，念慧深廣猶如大海莫知淵際。
translation: Ananda, however, has limited knowledge; there are great bodhisattvas in this assembly whose mindfulness and wisdom are as deep and wide as an ocean whose limit is unknown.

source_sentence: 此諸菩薩不付囑邪？」
translation: Wouldn't these bodhisattvas entrust him with this?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「海意！
translation: The Buddha said, "Haiyi!

source_sentence: 非彼阿難己之慧力，而能受持如是正法，皆由如來威神建立。
translation: It wasn't Ānanda's own wisdom that made it possible for him to maintain such a correct teaching, but it was all established by the Tathāgata's authoritative power.

source_sentence: 汝今當知！
translation: Now you should know!

source_sentence: 於後末世有諸眾生，於阿難所，聽受如是甚深正法，聞已信樂，生大歡喜，發希有心應作是言：『皆是如來不可思議威神建立，聲聞之人乃能如是受持甚深廣大經典。』
translation: In the latter part of time, there will be sentient beings in Ānanda's presence who hear and accept such a profound and correct teaching, become convinced and overjoyed, and give rise to a rare intention to say, 'It's because of the unfathomable authority and power of the Tathāgata that a direct disciple can thus maintain such a profound and vast sūtra.'

source_sentence: 此即如來威神加持力故。」
translation: This is because of the Tathāgata's authoritative and spiritual empowerment."

source_sentence: 時眾會中，或有天人作是思念：「彼海意菩薩，念總持力豈有間邪？
translation: At the time, some gods or humans in the assembly thought, "Could there be a time when that Hayagrīva Bodhisattva's mindfulness of the scriptures was so powerful that it didn't interfere with his ability to maintain them?

source_sentence: 何故世尊但說阿難多聞第一？」
translation: Why does the Bhagavān simply say that Ānanda is the most well-versed?"

source_sentence: 爾時，尊者大迦葉知眾有疑，觀察大會，前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Knowing that the crowd had doubts, the Venerable Mahākāśyapa then observed the assembly and said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 海意菩薩念總持力豈有間邪？
translation: Is there any room for the power of the bodhisattva's recollection of the scriptures?

source_sentence: 何故世尊但說阿難多聞第一？」
translation: Why does the Bhagavān simply say that Ānanda is the most well-versed?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「迦葉！
translation: The Buddha said, "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 假使殑伽沙數等佛剎土中，攝聚眾生皆悉遍滿。
translation: Suppose you were to gather a collection of sentient beings in a sands numbered buddha land and they were all filled.

source_sentence: 於汝意云何？
translation: What do you think?

source_sentence: 彼眾生界寧為多不？」
translation: Is that sentient being's realm rather numerous?"

source_sentence: 迦葉白佛言：「甚多，世尊！
translation: Kāśyapa said to the Buddha, "Very much, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 甚多，善逝！」
translation: Very abundant, good riddance!"

source_sentence: 佛言：「迦葉！
translation: The Buddha said, "Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 正使如是諸眾生等，無前、無後一時皆得人身，一一皆具念總持力，悉與尊者阿難等無有異。
translation: "It's precisely because all these sentient beings attain personal status at one time or another, and each of them possesses the power of the total maintenance of mindfulness, they're no different from Venerable Ānanda and the others.

source_sentence: 若以如上諸眾生等念總持力，比海意菩薩念總持力，百分不及一，乃至烏波尼殺曇分亦不及一。
translation: If these sentient beings and others possess the power of the total maintenance of mindfulness, it's less than one percent of the power of the total maintenance of mindfulness of the bodhisattva Hayagrīva, and even less than one percent of the Upaniṣad.

source_sentence: 迦葉！
translation: Kāśyapa!

source_sentence: 此海意菩薩，能以十方諸佛世尊所說之法，皆悉任持而無障礙，非於一佛、二佛所說之法無障礙故。
translation: "This ocean-minded bodhisattva can hold all the teachings of the world-honored buddhas in the ten directions without obstruction, not because the teachings of one or two buddhas are unobstructed.

source_sentence: 譬如天雨入大海中，非但容受一渧、二渧而無障礙，乃至容受一切雨滴悉無障礙，而彼大海不增、不減。
translation: It's like when rain from the sky falls into the ocean, it doesn't just accept one or two drops without obstruction, but it also accepts all drops of rain without obstruction, and the ocean doesn't increase or decrease.

source_sentence: 海意菩薩亦復如是，悉能任持諸佛世尊所說之法，皆無障礙，非於一佛、二佛所說之法無障礙故，而是菩薩念總持力，亦無增、減。」
translation: So it is with the bodhisattva Sāgarī, who is able to retain all the teachings of the buddhas without obstruction, not because the teachings of one or two buddhas are unobstructed but because the bodhisattva's power of maintaining mindfulness is also neither greater nor lesser."

source_sentence: 說是法時，會中有八千眾生，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，咸作是言：「我等當願各得念總持力，如海意菩薩。」
translation: When this teaching was given, 8,000 sentient beings in the assembly aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment and said, "We must each hope to attain the power of the total maintenance of mindfulness like the bodhisattva Hayagrīva."

source_sentence: 爾時，會中諸天及人，各以妙花向佛世尊及海意菩薩，散擲供養。
translation: At the time, the gods and humans in the assembly each presented the Bhagavān and Saṃbodhisattva Hayagrīva with a wonderful flower and scattered it as an offering.

source_sentence: 於是會中有一菩薩，名蓮花莊嚴，前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Then, there was a bodhisattva in the assembly named Lotus Adornment who went up to the Buddha and said, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若善男子、善女人，於此甚深法門，聞已信解，受持讀誦，如理伺察，依法修行者，是人得幾數福？」
translation: If good sons and good women hear and understand this profound teaching, retain it, read and recite it, examine it accurately, and practice it according to the rules, how many merits will this person attain?"

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即說伽陀，答蓮花莊嚴菩薩曰：「正使大千世界中，　　遍滿真金用施佛；　聞是法藏信解時，　　此福比前為最勝。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed Gadha and answered the Lotus Adornment Bodhisattva, "It's precisely because there are a great trichiliocosm full of genuine gold that's used to give to the Buddha; when you hear this dharma-store and believe it, this merit is superior to the previous one.

source_sentence: 正使十千世界中，　　滿中珍寶施如來；　若能持讀此深經，　　其福比前不可數。
translation: It's precisely because there are 10,000 worlds full of treasures to give to the Tathāgata; if they could maintain and read this profound sūtra, their merit would be incalculable compared with the prior one.

source_sentence: 又若十千世界中，　　滿中珍寶廣行施；　若能宣說此深經，　　其福勝前不可數。
translation: Also, if there were 10,000 worlds filled with treasures that are widely offered, and if someone could teach this profound sūtra, their merit would be incalculable compared with the prior one.

source_sentence: 正使千俱胝剎土，　　廣積珍寶滿其中；　普施諸佛世間尊，　　修行此法勝於彼。
translation: That's exactly what causes a thousand corpuscular buddhas to fill them with treasures and give them to the world-honored buddhas, whose cultivation of this teaching is superior to theirs.

source_sentence: 十方殑伽沙數量，　　寶嚴佛剎施如來；　此法真實修學時，　　其福比前不可數。
translation: When this teaching is truly cultivated, its merits are incalculable compared to those of the previous Tathāgatas, which are numerous in the sands of the ten directions and are endowed with the jeweled buddha bases.

source_sentence: 四種法具無邊福，　　佛亦不能說邊際；　發菩提心并護法，　　起大悲及修法行。
translation: These four kinds of qualities possess limitless merit, and even the Buddha can't explain their limits; they give rise to the mind of enlightenment and protect the Dharma, arousing great compassion and cultivating the practice of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 四種法具無量福，　　智者聞已不生疑；　虛空界與眾生界，　　菩提心及諸佛智。
translation: The four kinds of dharmas have measureless merit, and a wise person who hears them won't have doubts about them; the realm of space and the realm of sentient beings, the mind of enlightenment, and the wisdom of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 我此宣說正法寶，　　震動十方俱胝剎；　放淨光明及雨花，　　不鼓自鳴百種樂。
translation: I hereby proclaim the treasure of the right Dharma, which shakes the corpuscles in the ten directions, emits pure light and rain flowers, and roars with a hundred kinds of joy without drumming.

source_sentence: 一切菩薩大智士，　　發最勝心伸偈讚；　聞此所說妙法門，　　各得善利無虛果。
translation: All bodhisattvas of great wisdom arouse their most excellent minds and extend their praise in verse; hearing this wonderful teaching, each will attain good benefits that have no false results.

source_sentence: 從我得聞如是法，　　眾生普獲諸善利；　皆由如來所護持，　　令菩提心無忘失。
translation: From me hearing such a teaching, sentient beings everywhere attain good benefits; it's all because the Tathāgata guards them, so that the mind of enlightenment isn't lost.

source_sentence: 千俱胝數十方佛，　　各各合掌而頂禮；　稱讚德海大聖尊，　　善住加持釋師子。
translation: Thousands of the myriad buddhas of the ten directions bowed their heads with folded palms in homage, praising the great sage honored one of the ocean of virtue who well abides and upholds the lion of Śākyamuni.

source_sentence: 天、龍、修羅、緊那羅，　　乾闥婆及夜叉等；　梵王、帝釋、護世天，　　各處空中作是語：『願釋師子久住世，　　最上正法無減沒，　勇猛菩薩聖眾尊，　　護持如是深妙法。』
translation: Gods, dragons, sūras, kiṃnaras, gandharvas, yakṣas, and others, Brahmā, Indra, and the world-protecting gods each spoke this in the air, 'May Shishuja long endure in the world, the supreme right dharma undiminished, and the noble multitude of courageous bodhisattvas uphold such a profound and subtle dharma.'

source_sentence: 有受持此法眼者，　　我等當往現其身；　於彼尊重及策勤，　　密護令其無衰惱。」
translation: We will go to him and show him our respect and diligence, and we will guard him closely so that he isn't troubled."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊告海意菩薩言：「海意！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the Hayagrīva Bodhisattva, "Hayagrīva!

source_sentence: 今此正法是大法眼，是妙法印，是勝法幢，決擇諸法，分別諸法。
translation: This right teaching is the great eye of the Dharma, the seal of the wonderful Dharma, and the banner of the excellent Dharma, which discerns qualities and discriminates qualities.

source_sentence: 而彼過去、未來、現在諸佛世尊，皆說是法。
translation: These buddhas and world-honored ones of the past, future, and present all teach this Dharma.

source_sentence: 海意！
translation: Haiyi!

source_sentence: 我先已說，汝等應當尊重恭敬，志誠堅固如理修行。」
translation: I've already explained this, so you should respect and venerate it, be sincere and resolute, and cultivate it according to reality."

source_sentence: 佛說此經已，海意菩薩等諸大菩薩摩訶薩眾，及諸世間天、人、阿修羅、乾闥婆等，一切大會聞佛所說，皆大歡喜，信受奉行。
translation: After the Buddha taught this sūtra, all the great congregations of bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and worldly gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas who heard what he taught rejoiced greatly and believed and approved of it.

source_sentence: 佛說海意菩薩所問淨印法門經卷第十八澂舉意刻藏，趙水臣歷授此方撰述數卷，讀之，心知其非佛語，不願刻，送還水臣。
translation: When he read it, he knew at heart that it was not the words of the Buddha, so he did not wish to have it engraved and returned it to Shuichen.

source_sentence: 後得《淨印經》，則字字句句，無非甚深玅義。
translation: When he later obtained the Jingyin jing, every word and phrase was nothing but profound insight.

source_sentence: 信是世尊金口所宣，快意踊躍。
translation: Believing it was pronounced by the Bhagavān's golden mouth, I was overjoyed.

source_sentence: 數十年前，曾夢大水充滿世界，而人民國土都無損礙。
translation: Decades ago, I once dreamed that the world was filled with great waters, but none of the people's lands were harmed.

source_sentence: 澂游衍其中，如常安樂。
translation: It wandered about in it as if it were always at ease.

source_sentence: 覺而異之，此非心想所及，無乃妖祥乎？
translation: I wondered, "Isn't this something that's not part of the mind's conception, or is it just a demon?

source_sentence: 今是經首，稱瑞應，適與夢符；則昔之現夢，今之值經，似非偶然。
translation: Now, this is the first point of the sūtra, which is called a portentous response and appropriately matches a dream; then it seems to be no accident that it was a dream in the past and is now worthy of the sūtra.

source_sentence: 澂願藉是因緣，首度先父大學士文靖公嚴訥，先母一品夫人吳氏，即生蓮界，見佛聞法，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Through these causes and conditions, I hope to first save my late father, Wenjing Gong Yanne, a college scholar, and my late mother, Wu, a first-class wife, who were born in the lotus realm, saw the Buddha and heard the Dharma, and attained unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 次度一切冤親，一切眾生，悉成佛道，有一眾生不得度者，澂不取自度。
translation: Next, he saved all his enemies and relatives, and all sentient beings became buddhas, and if there was one sentient being he couldn't save, he would never save himself.

source_sentence: 萬曆三十六年，歲在戊申，十月朔吉，邵武守道澈嚴澂書。
translation: Written by Shouwu Shoudao Che Yanshou in the auspicious tenth month of the thirty-sixth year of the Wanli period.
